rukus.text: Udhina Lilladhina Yuqataluna Bi'annahum Zulimu Wa 'Inna Allaha `Ala Nasrihim Laqadirun

Al-Ladhina 'Ukhriju Min Diyarihim Bighayri Haqqin 'Illa 'An Yaqulu Rabbuna Allahu Wa Lawla Daf`u Allahi An-Nasa Ba`ahum Biba`in Lahuddimat Sawami`u Wa Biya`un Wa Salawatun Wa Masajidu Yudhkaru Fiha Asmu Allahi Kathiraan Wa Layansuranna Allahu Man Yansuruhu 'Inna Allaha Laqawiyun `Azizun
Al-Ladhina 'In Makkannahum Fi Al-'Ari 'Aqamu As-Salaata Wa 'Ataw Az-Zakaata Wa 'Amaru Bil-Ma`rufi Wa Nahaw `Ani Al-Munkari Wa Lillahi `Aqibatu Al-'Umuri
Wa 'In Yukadhibuka Faqad Kadhabat Qablahum Qawmu Nuhin Wa `Adun Wa Thamudu
Wa 'Ashabu Madyana Wa Kudhiba Musa Fa'amlaytu Lilkafirina Thumma 'Akhadhtuhum Fakayfa Kana Nakiri
Faka'ayyin Min Qaryatin 'Ahlaknaha Wa Hiya Zalimatun Fahiya Khawiyatun `Ala `Urushiha Wa Bi'rin Mu`attalatin Wa Qasrin Mashidin
Afalam Yasiru Fi Al-'Ari Fatakuna Lahum Qulubun Ya`qiluna Biha 'Aw 'Adhanun Yasma`una Biha Fa'innaha La Ta`ma Al-'Absaru Wa Lakin Ta`ma Al-Qulubu Allati Fi As-Suduri
Wa Yasta`jilunaka Bil-`Adhabi Wa Lan Yukhlifa Allahu Wa`dahu Wa 'Inna Yawmaan `Inda Rabbika Ka'alfi Sanatin Mimma Ta`udduna
Wa Ka'ayyin Min Qaryatin 'Amlaytu Laha Wa Hiya Zalimatun Thumma 'Akhadhtuha Wa 'Ilayya Al-Masiru
